title: Drawing, "Vanity", early 20th century
medium: Graphite and green color pencil on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite
markings: Stamp in black ink at lower right: DONALD DESKEY/ 145 WEST 57TH STREET/ NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite at center right: POL. CHROME/ SEE NIGHT TABLE; inscribed in graphite at center right: OK/Mildred K....[----]; inscribed in graphite at lower left: 9; inscribed in graphite at upper margin, right: (a check); inscribed in red color pencil at lower right: P; lower right margin in graphite: SCALE: 1"=1'0"/7521 [circled]; inscribed dimensions.
description: Perspective, plan, and elevation drawing for long rectangular vanity. Glass top with rounded front corners on top of wooden U-shaped, rectangular base. Cabinet on lower right of vanity with rounded outer surface and vertical rectangular drawer pull. Right side of vanity higher than glass surface at left; square surface with glass at center.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Vanity", early 20th century.
early 20th century. Graphite and green color pencil on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1988-101-1290.
